context.p: How to quick start your Wall Mountable Bluetooth DVD Player

step.cmd: First, insert the power adapter into a power outlet. Then connect the white power cable to the power adapter.

info.note: Press the square button to open the dust-proof task. Take out the chip-protection card before putting in the CD, and lock the case afterwards.

step.cmd: Put a CD into the DVD player and pull the power cable to turn on the device. You know it's on when the power indicator light is on and the CD starts to rotate.

info.note: After the CD rotates for 10-20 seconds, the speaker will start playing the video file

step.cmd: If you want to switch audio devices, press the MODE button on the remote control or the topside MODE button on the DVD player.
To turn off the DVD player, pull the power cable.
